general_query_list.answer: The meeting, which was held at the early stage of the project, focused on the product features and work division. Project manager proposed that the remote control had to be imaginative, trendy, user-friendly and international. Besides, the production cost should be no more than 12.5 Euros. In terms of the price, all members agreed that 25 Euros would be reasonable. They also clarified each person's duty. In the time remaining, the members did some tool training by drawing their favourite animals on the whiteboard.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the product features.
specific_query_list.answer: The remote control had to be original, trendy, easy to use, international and not too expensive.

specific_query_list.query: Why did Project Manager propose that the product should be international when discussing the product features?
specific_query_list.answer: Because it would be sold in the entire world and everyone would use it.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the conclusion of the discussion about the product price and cost as a part of the product features.
specific_query_list.answer: The remote control would be priced at 25 Euros and the product cost would be no more than 12.5 Euros.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the work division of the project.
specific_query_list.answer: Project manager would manage the whole group. Industrial Designer would think of the functions of the product. User interface designer would concentrate on the users' requirement and the relation between the users and the remote control. Marketing would give interface designer and industrial designer some trends about what should be done and what the users would like to have.

specific_query_list.query: What was the industrial designer's opinion about the job of user interface designer when discussing the work division?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial designer thought user interface designer's job was to focus on the relation between the users and the remote control and decide how the object looks – for example, where the button would be.

specific_query_list.query: What was the conclusion of the discussion about the difference between the industrial designer and user interface designer?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer would design the functions and figure out the industrial way to implement it while the user interface designer's job was to decide how the object looked. In short, the two were like the inside and the outside.
